    addButtonsAfterLosing() - Method in class ui.panels.mainpanels.BattlePanel
    Adds buttons for actions after losing a battle to the south panel.
    addButtonsAfterWinning() - Method in class ui.panels.mainpanels.BattlePanel
    Adds buttons for actions after winning a battle to the south panel.
    addEndGameButtons() - Method in class ui.panels.mainpanels.BattlePanel
    Adds a button to show credits after the game ends.
    addText(String) - Method in class ui.BattleTextArea
    Adds a new line of text to the battle text area.
    addTurnText(String, String, String, int) - Method in class ui.BattleTextArea
    Adds a new turn's battle text (attacker, defender, attack name, and defender's health).
    Attack - Class in game.characters
    Represents an attack with a name and a power value.
    Attack() - Constructor for class game.characters.Attack
     
    AttackButton - Class in ui.buttons
    Represents a button in the UI that, when clicked, performs an attack on an enemy using an associated Attack instance.
    AttackButton(Attack) - Constructor for class ui.buttons.AttackButton
    Constructs a button with an associated attack.
    AttackButtonsPanel - Class in ui.panels.otherpanels
    Represents the panel that contains buttons for the player's attack actions.
    AttackButtonsPanel() - Constructor for class ui.panels.otherpanels.AttackButtonsPanel
    Creates a new AttackButtonsPanel and initializes it with attack buttons.
    attackList - Variable in class game.characters.Entity
    A list of attacks available to the entity.
